body.p:
State of Kentucky
County of Hart

Washington Mansfield states on oath that on the 7th day of November 1865 in the county of Hart and state of Kentucky one Ben Johnson shot Samuel Mansfield of which shooting the said Samuel Mansfield has since died and he states said Ben Johnson is guilty of Murder and that said Ben Johnson has since said shooting fled and is now in affiant believes in the state of Illinois or the state of Missouri

p.hi: Washington Mansfield says that he believes Sworn to and subscribed by Washington Mansfield before me this

body.p: Sworn to and subscribed by Washington Mansfield this 16th Novr 1865
William Gardner P, J, H, C, C
Requisition on Govr. for Ben Johnson & W Mansfield apptd Agent 17 Nov /65
